q1.question: How secure is my data?
q1.answer: All data is encrypted on EU servers. Row Level Security (RLS) ensures only you have access.

q2.question: What if I reach my limit?
q2.answer: You can upgrade anytime or purchase add-ons (100 Smart Uploads for â‚¬0.99 or extra storage).

q3.question: Which file formats are supported?
q3.answer: PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Images (JPG, PNG) and many more. Preview without external viewers.

q4.question: Can I share documents?
q4.answer: Read-only links are planned. Currently all documents are owner-only.

q5.question: How does cancellation work?
q5.answer: Cancel anytime. Your data remains for 30 days.

q6.question: Is there an app?
q6.answer: The web app is fully responsive and works on all devices.

intro.title: 1. Privacy at a glance
intro.text: This privacy policy explains the type, scope and purpose of processing personal data within our web app.

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of data processing
purpose.text: We process your data exclusively for operating the web app:
purpose.item2: Smart Upload with OCR and AI metadata extraction
purpose.item3: Storage and management of your files

legal.art6b: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (contract performance)
legal.art6f: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest)

data.title: 5. What data is collected?
data.usage: Usage statistics (smart upload count, storage usage)

storage.title: 6. Storage location and retention
storage.text: All data is stored on EU servers. Retention: As long as your account is active. After deletion, data is removed within 30 days.

security.title: 7. Security measures
security.rls: Row Level Security (RLS) - only you have access to your data

cookies.title: 9. Cookies and tracking
cookies.text: We only use technically necessary cookies for app functionality. Analytics cookies are only set with your consent.

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.text: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy. The current version can always be found on this page.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.text: These terms apply to the use of Smart Docs web app for document management.

services.title: 2. Service description
services.smart: Smart Upload with OCR (page 1) and AI metadata extraction
services.preview: Preview of PDF, Office documents and images
services.organization: Automatic and manual organization with folders and tags

cancellation.title: 5. Cancellation
cancellation.text: You can cancel your subscription at any time via the customer portal. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period. Your data remains for 30 days after cancellation.

upgrade.title: 6. Upgrade and downgrade
upgrade.text: Plan changes are possible at any time. Upgrades are prorated, downgrades take effect from the next billing period.

userContent.title: 7. User content
userContent.text: You are responsible for uploaded content:
userContent.responsible: You guarantee that you own the rights to all uploaded files
userContent.legal: No illegal, defamatory or copyright-infringing content
userContent.rights: You retain all rights to your data

liability.title: 8. Liability
liability.text: We are not liable for data loss due to force majeure, user fault or technical defects. Regular backups are recommended.

availability.title: 9. Availability
availability.text: We aim for 99% availability. Maintenance is announced. There is no entitlement to constant availability.

law.title: 10. Applicable law
law.text: German law applies. Place of jurisdiction is {{City}}.

changes.title: 11. Changes to terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to adjust these terms. Changes are communicated by email and are deemed accepted if not objected to within 14 days.
